### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal mining operation at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of a Burner Mining Drill (position x=43.0, y=-82.0) and a Chest (position x=42.5, y=-83.5) to store the mined coal.

### Stone furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of a Furnace (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) to smelt stone into iron plates.

### Coal storage at position(x=42.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of a Chest (position x=42.5, y=-83.5) to store coal.

### Coal transportation at position(x=43.5, y=-80.5)
Consists of a Burner Inserter (position x=43.5, y=-80.5) to transport coal from the mining operation to the storage chests.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items from chests
- Ensure the chest contains the item you are trying to extract before attempting extraction.
- Check the chest's inventory to avoid attempting to extract items that are not present.

### Errors when using burners
- Ensure the burner has sufficient fuel before attempting to use it.
- Check the burner's fuel level to avoid running out of fuel during operation.

### Errors when using inserters
- Ensure the inserter has a valid source and destination before attempting to use it.
- Check the inserter's pickup and drop positions to! avoid attempting to transport items to or from invalid locations.

### Errors when mining
- Ensure the mining drill has sufficient fuel before attempting to mine.
- Check the mining drill's fuel level to avoid running out of fuel during operation.
- Ensure the chest at the drop position is not full before attempting to mine.
- Empty the chest at the drop position to continue mining.
